titles.title: For the relief of Rear Admiral Thomas T. Matteson, United States Maritime Service, of Kings Point, New York.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 4/30/1998--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified amount to a named individual for expenses associated with his last move home upon retirement from the position of Superintendent of the U.S. Merchant Marine Academy.
